column1: Uchi////Went for a Mommies HH. The HH rolls were ok (will try other rolls on regular menu when I return)
column2: but the other small plates were delicious! There were 5 of us
column3: and we ordered 1 of each HH food item
column4: which was perfect. The "machi cure" was my favorite. Ribs were fall off the bone delicious. Great ambiance.
